medium: 146 political badges of various shapes and sizes pinned on a T-shirt with a silkscreened image of Mao Zedong in pigtails by Zhang Hongtu
dimensions: badge: diam. 4.2 cm. (1 5/8 in.); overall: ca. 77 x ca. 90 cm. (30 5/16 x 35 7/16 in.)

texts.textentryhtml:
Round 4.2 cm. diam.  Gold Mao agst red ground, offset towards top of badge; floating on inner circle agst large bkgd with fine starburst texture, above a scene of Tiananmen (or sim.) with flags flying behind it.  Border = .35 cm w. Inscription in border from about 7:45 to 4:00: 伟大的导师 (sm. circle) 伟大的领袖 (center: sm star) 伟大的统师 (sm circle) 伟大的舵手.” Beneath the image of Tian’anmen = 7 sunflowers that follow the curved edge of the badge; an inscription runs across the face of the sunflowers (1 character per flower, except for the center #4, which has 2 together; flowers increase in size toward the center): “毛｜主｜席｜万岁｜万|万|岁.”
Back: small indent. No inscriptions. Pin/clasp = below center, left side sits lower.
–2009 Collection of Zhang Hongtu (Woodside, NY), by gift to the Princeton University Art Museum, 2009.

caption: Chinese, Modern period (1912–present). 146 political badges of various shapes and sizes pinned on a T-shirt with a silkscreened image of Mao Zedong in pigtails by Zhang Hongtu; 4.2 cm (image). Gift of Zhang Hongtu (2009-19.26)
